abstract: Bank of America’s shares rose sharply Monday following upbeat assessments from analysts at Citigroup and Goldman Sachs.
snippet: Bank of America’s shares rose sharply Monday following upbeat assessments from analysts at Citigroup and Goldman Sachs.
lead_paragraph: Kenneth D. Lewis may have gotten a rebuke from shareholders last month, but he was getting votes of confidence from Wall Street on Monday. Upbeat assessments from analysts at Citigroup and Goldman Sachs lit a fire under shares of Bank of America, the banking giant where he is chief executive — and was chairman until a few weeks ago, when shareholders voted to remove him from that latter post.

headline.main: Wall Street Warms Up to Bank of America
